name: storefront-backend
description: Udacity - fullstack javascript - project - storefront backend

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run copy:test && npx jasmine
scripts.migration:up: npm run build && npm run typeorm -- migration:run -d dist/src/config/data-source.js
scripts.migration:up:test: npm run copy:test && npm run migration:up
scripts.migration:up:dev: npm run copy:dev && npm run migration:up
scripts.migration:down: npm run build &&  npm run typeorm -- migration:revert -d dist/src/config/data-source.js
scripts.migration:down:test: npm run copy:test && npm run migration:down
scripts.migration:down:dev: npm run copy:dev && npm run migration:down

author: ThienTM2
